page.title: 13CRIME IN PLAYING PLACE/KEA
page.content: This is not an area of high crime. {Vandalism}is the most common problem as vandals, usually young people, break up public facilities and disfigure walls.If they are caught they are fined.Because a lot of shops operate a self-service system there is an increasing amount of stealing from shops{(shoplifting).}Guilty people are fined.We have a Police Constable living here and police drive through the area in cars.In spite of this there have been{breakins}and {burglaries}(about ten in one year), one or two minor{assaults}but no {serious crime,}like{murder.}For these offences the guilty are given jail sentences.{Vehicle}drivers commit {crime}by parking on double yellow lines (illegal), driving too fast or breaking the law by driving without insurance, road tax or M.O.T. test.
